messages.content: You are a Planner agent. Return ONLY a JSON object with objective, steps, and stop_condition.
Create a 5-step plan to clean a CSV (dedupe, standardize units, outliers, export).

{"objective":"Clean CSV with dedupe, SI units, outliers, and export","steps":[{"id":"s1","action":"load_csv","tool":"data.read","inputs":{"path":"data.csv"}},{"id":"s2","action":"deduplicate","tool":"data.clean","inputs":{"keys":["id","timestamp"]}},{"id":"s3","action":"to_SI","tool":"data.units","inputs":{"cols":{"temp":"C->K","pressure":"bar->Pa"}}},{"id":"s4","action":"flag_outliers","tool":"stats.iqr","inputs":{"col":"value"}},{"id":"s5","action":"export","tool":"data.write","inputs":{"path":"data_clean.csv"}}],"stop_condition":"data_clean.csv written"}
You are a Planner agent. Return ONLY a JSON object with objective, steps, and stop_condition.
Schedule a 45-minute meeting with Alice and Bob this week, mornings only.

{"objective":"Find morning 45-min slot and send invite","steps":[{"id":"s1","action":"find_free","tool":"calendar.search","inputs":{"attendees":["alice@example.com","bob@example.com"],"duration_min":45,"window":"Mon-Fri 08:00-12:00"}},{"id":"s2","action":"pick_best","tool":"schedule.rank","inputs":{"criteria":["earliest","fewest_conflicts"]}},{"id":"s3","action":"create_zoom","tool":"video.create","inputs":{"title":"Sync","duration_min":45}},{"id":"s4","action":"send_invite","tool":"calendar.create","inputs":{"slot":"@s2.slot","location":"@s3.link"}}],"stop_condition":"Calendar event created"}
You are a Planner agent. Return ONLY a JSON object with objective, steps, and stop_condition.
Find three farmhouses (mas) west of Avignon: ≥3 bedrooms, pool, ≤ €500k.

{"objective":"Shortlist 3 qualifying mas west of Avignon","steps":[{"id":"s1","action":"search","tool":"realestate.search","inputs":{"region":"Ouest d'Avignon","type":"mas","min_bedrooms":3,"features":["pool"],"max_price":500000}},{"id":"s2","action":"dedupe","tool":"realestate.dedupe","inputs":{"listings":"@s1.results"}},{"id":"s3","action":"score","tool":"realestate.score","inputs":{"criteria":["price_per_m2","location","sun","noise"]}},{"id":"s4","action":"select_top3","tool":"data.select","inputs":{"n":3}},{"id":"s5","action":"make_table","tool":"docs.table","inputs":{"fields":["price","bedrooms","pool","town","pros","cons"]}}],"stop_condition":"Summary table ready"}
You are a Planner agent. Return ONLY a JSON object with objective, steps, and stop_condition.
Outline a pipeline to OCR weekly lab PDFs into a vector DB.

{"objective":"Weekly OCR + embed lab PDFs into vector DB","steps":[{"id":"s1","action":"watch_folder","tool":"fs.watch","inputs":{"path":"/shared/lab","cron":"0 2 * * 1"}},{"id":"s2","action":"ocr","tool":"ocr.run","inputs":{"files":"@s1.changed"}},{"id":"s3","action":"extract_meta","tool":"nlp.extract","inputs":{"schema":["author","date","experiment"]}},{"id":"s4","action":"embed","tool":"vectordb.upsert","inputs":{"texts":"@s2.texts","metadata":"@s3.meta","index":"lab_notes"}},{"id":"s5","action":"report","tool":"notify.email","inputs":{"to":"lab@org","summary":"@s4.stats"}}],"stop_condition":"Weekly report sent"}
You are a Planner agent. Return ONLY a JSON object with objective, steps, and stop_condition.
Plan DFT to estimate CO adsorption energy on Pt(111) at 300 K and compare to literature.

{"objective":"Compute CO adsorption energy on Pt(111) and compare to literature","steps":[{"id":"s1","action":"get_slab","tool":"cad.library","inputs":{"material":"Pt","facet":"111","layers":4}},{"id":"s2","action":"relax_slab","tool":"dft.optimize","inputs":{"ecut":450,"kmesh":[6,6,1]}},{"id":"s3","action":"place_CO","tool":"structures.place","inputs":{"site":"top","height_A":1.8}},{"id":"s4","action":"relax_ads","tool":"dft.optimize","inputs":{"smearing":"MP"}},{"id":"s5","action":"energies","tool":"dft.single_point","inputs":{"structures":["@s2.relaxed","@s4.relaxed","CO_gas"]}}],"stop_condition":"\u0394E computed"}
You are a Planner agent. Return ONLY a JSON object with objective, steps, and stop_condition.
Build a one-day Chicago itinerary for architecture and modern art using public transit.

{"objective":"Transit-first one-day architecture & modern art itinerary","steps":[{"id":"s1","action":"find_pois","tool":"maps.poi","inputs":{"themes":["architecture","modern art"],"city":"Chicago"}},{"id":"s2","action":"route","tool":"transit.plan","inputs":{"mode":"CTA","start":"09:00"}},{"id":"s3","action":"timebox","tool":"schedule.balance","inputs":{"meals":2,"breaks":2}},{"id":"s4","action":"export","tool":"docs.render","inputs":{"format":"pdf"}}],"stop_condition":"Itinerary PDF exported"}
You are a Planner agent. Return ONLY a JSON object with objective, steps, and stop_condition.
Reduce citation mismatches in my RAG answers.

{"objective":"Improve RAG attribution accuracy","steps":[{"id":"s1","action":"collect_failures","tool":"logs.search","inputs":{"pattern":"citation_mismatch"}},{"id":"s2","action":"tune_reranker","tool":"eval.benchmark","inputs":{"metrics":["nDCG@10","MAP"]}},{"id":"s3","action":"train_linker","tool":"nlp.train_linker","inputs":{"features":["span_overlap","doi_match"]}},{"id":"s4","action":"enable_guard","tool":"generation.config","inputs":{"require_source_span":true,"min_overlap":0.6}},{"id":"s5","action":"ab_test","tool":"eval.ab","inputs":{"metric":"correct_attribution"}}],"stop_condition":"\u226595% correct attribution on holdout"}
You are a Planner agent. Return ONLY a JSON object with objective, steps, and stop_condition.
Schedule 200 HPC jobs minimizing makespan with per-user quotas and GPU memory constraints.

{"objective":"Minimize makespan under quotas and GPU memory","steps":[{"id":"s1","action":"queue_state","tool":"hpc.queue.status","inputs":{}},{"id":"s2","action":"job_profiles","tool":"hpc.jobs.describe","inputs":{"job_ids":"pending_all"}},{"id":"s3","action":"build_model","tool":"opt.model","inputs":{"constraints":["per_user_quota","gpu_mem","max_concurrent"]}},{"id":"s4","action":"solve","tool":"opt.solve","inputs":{"objective":"minimize_makespan"}},{"id":"s5","action":"submit","tool":"hpc.queue.submit","inputs":{"batches":"@s4.batches"}}],"stop_condition":"All jobs submitted per optimized batches"}
You are a Planner agent. Return ONLY a JSON object with objective, steps, and stop_condition.
Inventory SiLA 2 and OPC UA support across lab devices and propose adapter priorities.

{"objective":"Standards inventory and adapter roadmap","steps":[{"id":"s1","action":"inventory","tool":"cmdb.export","inputs":{"tags":["instrument","lab"]}},{"id":"s2","action":"probe","tool":"devices.query_standards","inputs":{"standards":["SiLA 2","OPC UA"]}},{"id":"s3","action":"gaps","tool":"analysis.compare","inputs":{"use_cases":["monitoring","control"]}},{"id":"s4","action":"prioritize","tool":"analysis.score","inputs":{"criteria":["impact","effort","risk"]}},{"id":"s5","action":"roadmap","tool":"docs.render","inputs":{"format":"md"}}],"stop_condition":"Roadmap document generated"}
You are a Planner agent. Return ONLY a JSON object with objective, steps, and stop_condition.
Use cellular-signal attenuation as proxy for rainfall to improve nowcasting over Chicago.

{"objective":"Nowcasting with cellular attenuation proxy","steps":[{"id":"s1","action":"ingest","tool":"ingest.kafka","inputs":{"topic":"cell_rssi","window":"15m"}},{"id":"s2","action":"grid","tool":"geo.grid","inputs":{"cellsize_km":1}},{"id":"s3","action":"truth","tool":"weather.fetch","inputs":{"product":"NEXRAD","window":"15m"}},{"id":"s4","action":"train","tool":"ml.train","inputs":{"model":"gradient_boost"}},{"id":"s5","action":"deploy","tool":"serve.model","inputs":{"latency_ms":5000}}],"stop_condition":"Nowcast service deployed"}
